text: Julie Frances Reardon (born 6 June 1958) is an Australian judoka. She won the bronze medal at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the extra-lightweight event. She won the bronze medal, at the 1984 World Judo Championships, in the -48 kg category. She won a bronze medal at the 1990 Commonwealth Games. == References == == Other websites == * Olympic Judo Sister Suzanne Williams and Julie Reardon put on an...
